data.client_settings: Discord TestFlight 1.10.0 (Build 1505), issue not present in previous (1476) build
data.expected_result: More options open up with Profile, Close DM, Report etc)
data.short_description: Extra settings menu (... button on top right, in DMs) causes app to crash if opening it while in a call (voice or video) with the same person
data.steps_to_repro: - Go in a private call with someone - While in DM screen with the same person you're calling with, tap on the more settings button (... icon on top right)
